Rivers State Waste Management Agency (RIWAMA) bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị nke Rivers State nke na-ahụ maka ịkwalite gburugburu ebe obibi na ebumnuche nke inweta mgbanwe dị mma na nke dị ukwuu na ọnọdụ ndụ yana ibelata ọrịa ma ọ bụ nsogbu ahụike na steeti ahụ
Ọ bụ ụlọ omebe iwu nke Rivers State mepụtara ya n'afọ 2013 ma gọvanọ steeti kwadoro ya n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2014
Tupu nke a, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka "Rivers State Environmental Sanitation Authority (RSESA) " nke e guzobere n'afọ 1983 iji dozie ihe mkpofu obodo na nsogbu ndị ọzọ metụtara ya.
